rBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

res.rBody:
Sicut cedrus exaltata sum in Libano et sicut cypressus
in monte Sion in montem Sion quasi myrrha electa
dedi dedit suavitatem odoris

vBody.wit: CAO-C CAO-B CAO-E CAO-M CAO-V CAO-H CAO-R CAO-F CAO-S CAO-L

verses.vBody: Et sicut cinnamomum Sicut cinnamomum et balsamum aromatizans
